content: What are the plans of Medmij re STU3? Will the standards migrate once STU3 is there, or are the current specs final? And any expectations on what will be implemented 'in the field'?

A related question. I know that SMART-on-FHIR will be "part-of" the FHIR specs. I hope that MedMij also will comply with SMART-on-FHIR. I know most bigger EHR's already implement SMART-on-FHIR, EPIC, Cerner, allscripts.
Kickstarts will go STU2 because there is nothing else. As soon as STU3 comes out we will upgrade. The net effect should be that widespread implementation is on STU3.

MedMij currently does not say or do anything that promotes or prohibits SMART. This is in the Basic Requirements/Basiseisen realm that the Ministry of Health oversees. Hence Nictiz doesn't formally have an opinion in this stage, but Ministry of Health will
